title: Test Crossword Book
subtitle: 50 Puzzles for Relaxation
author: Test Author
description: A collection of 5 puzzles for relaxation and enjoyment.

cover_design.dalle_prompt: Create a Professional book cover design, clean modern layout, high contrast typography. Title: 'Test Crossword Book'. Include crossword puzzle grids in background, letter tiles, word patterns. Use elegant green and cream color scheme with silver accents. Feature clear, professional typography, modern sans-serif fonts. The cover should be designed for paperback format, eye-catching for Amazon KDP marketplace, appealing to puzzle enthusiasts and seniors. Include subtle brain/mind imagery to suggest cognitive benefits. Ensure text is highly readable and professional appearance suitable for bookstore shelves.
cover_design.target_audience: puzzle enthusiasts, seniors, brain training seekers
